FuncDef: This command configures the multicast CAC policy name. MCAC policy is not supported with MLD-snooping, therefore executing the command in the mld-snooping contexts will return an error.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the multicast CAC policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
